short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly show a QR code for the current page URL by clicking Ctrl+Space

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QTP - QR This Page! is a convenient and easy-to-use Chrome extension that allows you to quickly generate a QR code for the current page you are viewing. With just a simple key combination of Ctrl+Space, you can instantly display a QR code that represents the URL of the page you are on.

This extension is perfect for those who frequently share links with others or want to easily access a webpage on their mobile device without having to type out a long URL. The generated QR code can be easily scanned by any QR code reader app on your phone, making it a breeze to access the page on the go.

QTP - QR This Page! is lightweight, fast, and free to use. It requires no additional setup or configuration, simply install the extension and start generating QR codes with ease. Try it out today and simplify the way you share and access links!
